inclusion.criterion: Active disease at time of enrollment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients taking oral dapsone or those who have taken oral dapsone within four weeks prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients using any other topical treatment for dermatitis herpetiformis at time of enrollment or within the four weeks prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women will be excluded if pregnant or nursing
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
